account.loginBanner: Welcome back! It's good to see you again.
account.signUpBanner: Welcome! We're so glad you're here.

personalInformation.infoNote: Keep your contact info up to date. We'll only use it if we need to get in touch with you.

email.tooltip: Please reach out to our customer support team at {{-email}} if you wish to update your email address.

donationVariant.subprize: Enter now and you could win {{prize, en-handle-an}}! Ends {{endDate}}.

footer.copyright: Copyright © {{fullYear}}, Omaze, Inc. All rights reserved.

sweepstake.heroTitleWinnerPending: Thanks to everyone who entered to win {{sweepstakeTitle, en-handle-an}} {{sweepstakeTitle}}
sweepstake.bodyCopyEmphasis: Winner will be announced on or around
sweepstake.winWinCaf: was granted by CAF America to {{-charityDetailsTitle}} thanks to the generosity of the Omaze donor community

moreToWin.title: More to win-win
moreToWin.donateTitle: Donate {{ price }} and get {{ numEntries }} entries to:

thankYou.title: Thanks for your payment
thankYou.body: A payment to Stripe will appear on your statement.

createAccountMessage.message: To verify your account, check your email

footNote.partTwo: Check your spam folder or reach out to our customer support team at

experiences.activeContextWithExperiences: You're in it to win it! Check out key dates and prize details, and easily enter again. Your most recent entries can take up to a couple of minutes to appear.
experiences.closedContextWithNoExperiences: If you entered an experience, check back here once it closes to see who won and how much was raised!
experiences.closedContextWithExperiences: These experiences are wrapped up—see the winner status and find out who won below!
experiences.dontMissContext: Don’t miss out on your opportunity to win something amazing and support a great cause.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.submitting: Submitting order, please do not close this window
checkout.error: There has been an error submitting this order, please try again
checkout.submitted: This order has been submitted already.
checkout.alreadyCompleted: This order has been already completed or cancelled, please start a new one.
checkout.legalDisclaimer: By placing your order, you agree to our {{-termsOfService}} and {{-privacyPolicy}}.
checkout.signUpForEmails: Want bonus entries, winner info, impact updates and more? Sign up for our emails! It's not required and you can opt out at any time. For more information view our {{-privacyPolicy}}.

lineItem.noteWithSubprizes: Entries towards {{-prize}} and each Early Bird prize:

warning.title: Where Do Your Donations Go?
warning.content: Omaze fundraises for various US-registered 501(c) (3) public charities (each a "Charity Client") who receive 100% of the donations raised from Omaze's experiences. The Charity Client associated with an experience then grants the donations, minus experience fees and costs, to the identified nonprofit grantee. For more info on an Experience's Charity Client and the nonprofit grantee, see the Experience Rules and "Fundraising Transparency" section at the bottom of each experience page.

banner.title: We see you are visiting us from outside Florida, US. Unfortunately, non FL residents cannot contribute to these specific fundraisers. But please know there are plenty of dream experiences you can enter for your chance to win clicking link below.

subprizes.title: Enter today and win even more!
subprizes.subtitle: We're giving away spectacular Early Bird Prizes to those of you who enter early. The sooner you enter, the more prizes you have the chance to win.
subprizes.winnerOf: {{- winnerName}} from {{ winnerLocation}} won the {{- subprizeTitle }}

404.subtitle: Oops! This is awkward...
404.explanation: It looks like this page either doesn’t exist or is no longer active. Let’s find a better place for you to go.

500.subtitle: Oops! This is awkward...
500.explanation: It looks like there was an error from our side. Let’s find a better place for you to go.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenance.explanation: We're having some technical difficulties, but we'll be back soon!
